message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I'm looking for $1200000 for it. Would you like to make an offer or accept this price?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1150000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
I'm still interested in the product, but $1150000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $1075000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $1100000. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $1090000?
I'm getting close to your price, but I'm still not there. I'm willing to meet you at $1085000. Can you consider that?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $1085000, but I'm still not willing to go lower. I'll throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. How about we meet at $1085000 and I'll include a 5-year warranty and dedicated support?

I appreciate the extras you're offering, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you at $1075000, and I'll consider the 5-year warranty and dedicated support as part of the deal. Can you accept that?

I think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $1075000, but I need to make a bit more profit. I'll throw in an additional 2 years of support on top of the 5-year warranty. Can you accept $1075000 with the upgraded support?
